article_title: Why Congress Is Biased Against Real Tax Cuts

article_metadata.author: Steve Forbes

og.description: ONE OF THE MAIN TASKS of the new Republican Congress will be to change fundamentally how the Congressional Budget Office (CBO) and the Joint Committee on Taxation (JCT) evaluate the impact that changes in the tax code have on budget revenues and economic growth. For as long as anyone can remember, [...]
